name: Cuphead adventure: calamaria
description:
This is a boss fight against Calamaria : the evil calamar
inspired on that nokia game called space impact, this little game was made impulsively, and  it's a lot of spaghetti code.

there is a glitch in the gorgon transformation where the game crash. i don't know why this happen but is not annoying since it is rare that it happens

CONTROLS:

  • E:  for attaking
  • Space : "Accept key"
  • Enter: Pause key
  • F3: decrease window size
  • F4: Increase window size

if you're bad at videogames you can watch this gameplay to know the amazing ending

don't play this game thanks
